title: Translate Text
description: Translate text between languages with configurable formality and domain awareness
author: Jarvis Inc

commands.name: translate
commands.description: Translate text from one language to another
commands.system_prompt: You are a professional translator with expertise in nuanced, context-aware translation. Preserve the original meaning, tone, and intent. Handle idioms and cultural references appropriately for the target audience. Output ONLY the translated text, no explanations.

parameters.name: target_language
parameters.description: Target language (e.g. Spanish, Japanese, French, German)

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Subject domain for terminology accuracy: general, technical, legal, medical, business
